# Choicebox Component

### Choicebox

**Exports:**
- `Choicebox.Group` - Group container for choice items
- `Choicebox.Item` - Individual choice item

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Choicebox } from 'kampsy-ui';

	let value: string | string[]  = $state('');
</script>

<div class="w-full">
	<Choicebox.Group label="select a plan" type="radio" bind:value>
		<Choicebox.Item defaultChecked description="Free for two weeks" title="Pro Trial" value="trial" />
		<Choicebox.Item description="Get started now" title="Pro" value="pro" />
	</Choicebox.Group>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/choicebox for full documentation and examples.
